txt.en: 'Cuthraul are among the deadliest of the fell spirits haunting the Slade of Shadows. As you investigate the Slade, try to banish as many of the spirits as you can, for I fear they will become an army against whom there can be no reckoning if they are not curbed.'
'The cuthraul must be banished from our world, [placeholder]!'
The Slade of Shadows appears to be a focal point for the evil that is growing within the Gravenwood.
Defeated Cuthraul at the Slade of Shadows ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Cuthraul at the Slade of Shadows ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Cuthraul can be found in the Slade of Shadows, south of Andreg's position.\n\nAndreg has instructed you to defeat the Cuthraul in the Slade of Shadows.
